hypothesis_content.title: Volatility Compression Breakout Regime Transition
hypothesis_content.statement: When BTC 20-day realized volatility falls below 30% (compression) while price remains within 5% of 30-day high, a breakout above the 20-day Bollinger Band upper band with volume > 1.5x 20-day average signals transition from NEUTRAL to BULL regime with 70% probability.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Extended low volatility near highs represents accumulation/coiling. Breakout with volume suggests institutional participation and regime shift initiation.
entry_conditions: Daily close above 20-day Bollinger Band upper band

exit_conditions.take_profit: 15% gain from entry or regime shifts to BULL (confirmed by 5-day momentum > 3%)
exit_conditions.stop_loss: 8% loss from entry or volatility expands > 45% without directional move

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: More than 40% of signals result in false breakouts (return below Bollinger Band within 3 days) or lead to BEAR regime instead of BULL.
